sentences.en: He was confined in an internment camp in Utah.
sentences.cn: 他被监禁在犹他州的一个拘留营里。

sentences.en: They called for the return of internment without trial for terrorists.
sentences.cn: 他们呼吁对恐怖分子再次进行政治拘禁，无须审判。

sentences.en: The internment decision rankled for decades afterwards.
sentences.cn: 拘留的决定给后面的几十年造成了极坏的影响。
